MECHTRON

Run WebAssembly Everywhere

MECHTRON is an open source and free standard and framework for:

  • deploying WebAssembly components on the client and server
  • enabling messaging between those WebAssembly components
  • providing secure access to enterprise resources.

Presently the only engine for deploying and executing mechtrons is STARLANE

More info will be posted including a RUST implementation of the Mechtron Guest Interface on github and a getting started guide to help people create and deploy their first Mechtron.
